purpose: To facilitate the creation of AI copilots, chatbots, and in-app AI agents with a focus on ease of use and integration.
principle: Built on a React UI framework with support for AI integrations, leveraging modern web technologies for seamless deployment.
reusability: Highly composable with React components, supports integration with various AI models and APIs, open-source for customization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited feature set and stability issues.
name: CopilotKit
description: React UI + elegant infrastructure for AI Copilots, AI chatbots, and in-app AI agents. The Agentic last-mile ü™Å
highlight: Elegant infrastructure for building and deploying AI copilots and chatbots with React UI.
